text: Escape to Victory, also known as Victory, is a 1981 British American Italian World War II action movie directed by John Huston and was based on the 1961 Hungarian movie Two Half Times in Hell. It stars Sylvester Stallone, Michael Caine, Pelé, Bobby Moore, Osvaldo Ardiles, Max von Sydow, Kevin O'Callaghan, Søren Lindsted, Clive Merrison, Michael Cochrane, Zoltán Gera, Tim Pigott- Smith, Maurice Roëves and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1981 action movies Category:1981 war movies Category:British action movies Category:British war movies Category:American action movies Category:American war movies Category:Italian action movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by John Huston Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Escape to Victory
